name: Gales of Reverie
description: When your {REALNAME[ID(1) with this card equpped is in Windfavored state and after using Charged Attack: you will spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character" and deal 1 Anemo DMG.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1506] with this card equpped is in <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115061]</color> state and after using $[K51]: you will spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character" and deal 1 $[K105].
descriptionreplaced: When your #{REALNAME[ID(1) with this card equpped is in <color=#FFFFFFFF>Windfavored</color> state and after using <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>: you will spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character" and deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.
